parently close to my ear, addressed me in an audible
whisper; "I am satisfied; miserable wretch, you
have determined to live and I am satisfied."

I darted towards the spot from which the
sound proceeded but the devil eluded my grasp; sud-
denly the broard disk of the moon arose and shone
full upon his ghastly and distorted shape as he fled
with more than mortal speed.
